p:
Applying the Transport Modelling Tool (1), we derive changes in transport performance and mileage by scenario. The underlying data for this tool is based on local and regional transport surveys for working days and is comprised of the following baseline parameters for each city:
Number of trips by category of trip length and mode (#)
Modal Share (%)
Number of trips per person and day (#/d/p)
Average trip length by transport mode (km)
Average trip duration by transport mode (h)
